metadata.name: PrivateLink with DNS Lab
metadata.description: Create or update a Hub and Spoke Infrastructure connected to an on-prem environment.

settings.commandToExecute: powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted Install-WindowsFeature -Name DNS -IncludeAllSubFeature -IncludeManagementTools; Add-DnsServerForwarder -IPAddress 8.8.8.8 -PassThru; exit 0
